title: Attention and Focus
question: You're on a first date at a cozy café. How likely are you to get distracted?
options: I'm all ears, barely notice anything else
I often find my attention wandering
What was the question again? That dog is adorable!

title: Attention and Focus 2
question: You're working on an important task. How often do you check your phone?
